author: agilliland
msg: preview images are png, not jpg.

author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-3168 j2g migration tool uses http://www.ibm.com/j2g for XML Namespace URI's.  Jason's patch changed them to http://geronimo.apache.org/xml/ns/j2g-1.0

author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-2718 - LobStreamsTest and BlobClob4BlobTest fail with JSR169 because missing support for encryption. Now, only running encryption part with vms supporting JDBC3 and higher.

author: wrowe
msg: SystemTimeToTzSpecificLocalTime is not implemented on Windows CE and is used in
the conversion of an APR time to an expanded local time.  The APR code did have
fallback code for Win9x which did not call this function.  The fallback code had
the deficiency of using the current offset for daylight savings time, not the
offset at the specified time.
Submitted by: Curt Arnold <carnold apache.org>
Reviewed by: Davi Arnaut
Backport: 543340
